Module edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem
Package edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem

Class Storage

java.lang.Object
edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem.Storage
public class Storage extends Object
This class holds the data of the hole program All members and books are stored in arrays here It also contains the currentUser which resembles the current user of the system It also provides methods through which data sources are updated or overwritten or created It reads the saved data from file when the program starts

    • findUser

      public static Member findUser(String username)
      Finds a user with its username
      Parameters:
      username - Shows the username supposed to be found
      Returns:
      Member with the entered username It returns null if such member does not exist

      public static void setCurrentUserNull()
